definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Usually we write family letters or business letters, according to a certain format.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常根據某種格式來寫家信或商業信函。

sentences.english: A compilation of aquaculture-related email discussion lists is also available on the site.
sentences.chinese: 還可在該網站看到有關水產業電子信函討論列表。

sentences.english: We hxdye the pleasure to acknowledge your fxdyour of yesterday advising 25 cases for Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 您昨日告知向上海發出25箱的信函我們已敬悉。

sentences.english: Thee essay is well-written with a standard format of legal letters, legal memoranda and briefs.
sentences.chinese: 緹律師信函，法律備忘錄，案件辯論書格式準確。

sentences.english: This health certificate can be submitted after receiving the letter of acceptance from TUT.
sentences.chinese: 健康證明書亦可於接到本校之錄取通知信函時寄繳。

sentences.english: We have the pleasure to acknowledge your favor of yesterday advising 25 cases for Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 您昨日告知向上海發出25箱的信函我們已敬悉。

sentences.english: Enron forwarded a copy of that letter to petitioner .
sentences.chinese: 安然轉寄了一份該信函的複印件給上訴人。

sentences.english: We are enclosing a photostatic copy of our letter dated June 2.
sentences.chinese: 隨函附加稅寄我們六月二日信函的影印件一份。

sentences.english: You letter of 15th August addressed to our Head Office has been passed on to us for attention and reply.
sentences.chinese: 您八月十五日致我總公司的信函已轉交到我處作復。
她信函內附有一張支票。

sentences.english: The essay is well-written with a standard format of legal letters, legal memoranda and briefs.
sentences.chinese: 律師信函，法律備忘錄，案件辯論書格式準確。

sentences.english: Most business letters are single-spaced with double spaces between the paragraphs.
sentences.chinese: 大部分商務信函的行距爲單行，段落之間用雙行。

definition: secret documents/abbr. for 機密文件|机密文件
